import React from "react"; import "./Header.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import SearchIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Search"; import ShoppingBasketIcon from "@material-ui/icons/ShoppingBasket"; import { useStateValue } from "./StateProvide"; function Header() { const [{ basket }] = useStateValue(); return (
Hello Quazi sign in
Returns & Orders
Your Prime
{basket.length}
); } export default Header;
